Swo bụ asụsụ Bantu nke mpaghara Akonolinga, Cameroon
Asụsụ nke aha ahụ na-agbanwe agbanwe, gụnyere So, Sso, Shwo, na Fo
A na-asụ Swo ma ọ bụ Só n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke obodo Akonolenga na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Akonolinga commune (na mpaghara Melan-et-Emvane, ngalaba Nyong-et-Mfoumou, Central Region)
Enwekwara ụfọdụ ndị na-ekwu okwu na Messamena commune
Ndị na-ekwu okwu swo bụ ndị Beti-Fang (Mvele, Omvang, Ewondo) gbara ya gburugburu
Swo bụ mgbanwe n'etiti Beti-Fang na Meka
